channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree root bump on pavement - trip hazard., 14th May
item.description:
Near the Royal Mail building. Quite central on the pavement. Near the two-legged road sign on which there is a yellow sign to Lewis Carroll Lodge. Trip hazard for people with poor, or no, sight.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poole Way, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Blocking 60% sunlight, 14th May
item.description:
8 London Road gl526df

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Berkeley Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 14th May
item.description:
Customer reports that the entire pavement at the location is potholed and broken up. They have tripped and fallen over at lunchtime and sustained cuts and bruises. Please can this be repaired.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Faded 'Keep Clear' road markings, 14th May
item.description:
In front of The Linen House, Wellington Lane, GL50 4JF, the 'Keep Clear' road markings have faded and so multiple vehicles park daily in front of my garage (I own The Linen House and have an in-built garage accessed from the front), preventing me from gaining access to and from it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 14th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please lift an replace x1 broken rocking 600x600x20mm with tarmac patch due to tree roots damage number 1 stats required (FW Broken Slabs)
